From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Gangon looked at BrightBlade and wondered what she was thinking about.....he
decided to discuss his latest news report...his feelings..LOL...... "lately
things have been a bit weird! that bot Plintissa comes up to the base and
wants to join, then she saves that Maximal? no way Hell Beast would want
someone like that!.....and how about Liono Prime?....it's like he's
invincible, he never feels your attacks and then he disappears!....there's
some other kooks i met out there, like Dinobot and his little girlfriend
Tavatron....i met them right before i met Dracona, super genius, tried to
ill me!....i met Dracona right before i met...you...." he said....nothing
could break the moment..except the wandering Sinister!....Sinister walked
over and climbed the tree...standing on top and surveying the
land.....gangon gasped....he looked up at this bot he had never seen
before....he jumped up and pulled out his machine guns.. "halt! who are
you?....." he said...Sinister laughed..... "i am Sinister of the
Predacons!...." he said....Gangon laughed.. "Megatron's side, right?...." he
said.... "no, Hell Beast....and who may i ask are you 2?..." Sinister
said..... "we are gangon and BrightBlade!...." he said, happy to come across
another of Hell beast's troops.. "let me guess, your BrightBlade...." he
said, pointing to Gangon...he laughed wildly...Gangon's machine gun rose
again.. "relax, i'm joking!....." Sinister said....he jumped down and walked
over to another tree, climbing up and looking around like before.... "see
what i mean? you and Hell beast are the only people i ever met that aren't
kooks!....." he said......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2000 1:10 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast wars


> BrightBlade, Rage
>
> * BrightBlade settled down beside Gangon and looked at the grapes that he
> had set down, she sniffed at them and then transformed into her robot
mode.
> She settled down against the same tree as Gangon and began to pick at the
> grapes, she would throw one into the air and catch it in her mouth. After
> swallowing that one she would then throw up another one and the process
> would start all over again.
> She sighed, this was relaxing!*
>
> ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
>
> * Rage looked at Scourge with puzzlement, if he could make her like him
> couldn't he make her like she used to be to?
> She touched his shoulder to get his attention.*
>
> " How you...change back?"
>
> * She tried her best to communicate to him that she wanted to return to
her
> beast mode, the energon buildup was beginning to short out her circuits
and
> it hurt her.
> Besides, she wanted to feel like she used to again, even though she knew
> that she would never be the same again.*
>
>
>
